title: # 348 - Greg Fitzsimmons & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Greg Fitzsimmons to talk about traveling Europe for 6 months, motivational speakers, cheating, booty calls, regrets, and much more!

Catch Greg on his podcast "Fitzdog Radio" and his other podcast with Alison Rosen "Childish" wherever you get your podcasts.

This episode is also brought to you by Open Fit. Get a free 30 day trial and lose up to 15 pounds by texting “Bert” to 303030

This episode is also brought to you by Blue Apron. Get $60 off today at www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

This episode is also brought to you by Quip. Get your first refill pack for free when you order a Quip electric toothbrush at www.getquip.com/bert 

This episode is also brought to you by Comedy Central’s “Your Two Dads with Sean & Julian” Subscribe to their podcast wherever you get your podcasts

The Body Shots Fall Tour is on pre sale now! Use the promo code “Shots” to get tickets at www.bertbertbert.com

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
